scenario_brief: Your beloved kitty sidekick, Captain Meow, has vanished without a trace! As a renowned adventurer and detective, you suspect foul play. The last clue? A cryptic paw print left on your desk and a strange voicemail message on your phone. Can you crack the codes, follow the trail, and rescue Captain Meow before it’s too late?
endGoal: Recover the stolen Project Sentinel prototype from the intruder's hidden exit route and secure all compromised data.

objects.name: Reception Phone
objects.text: The message is directing you towards finding the villain’s identity.

objects.name: Hidden Clue Note
objects.text: If you are reading this then I have been outsmarted and sadly captured...there are a series of clues I left behind for such circumstance, follow them to rescue me. I believe in you do not let me down :)

objects.name: Office Computer
objects.observations: A computer with a cybersecurity alert on screen. There might be pawprints on the keyboard.

objects.name: IT Memo
objects.text: URGENT: Unusual activity detected from the CEO’s office. Security cameras captured a shadowy figure with a cat carrier.
objects.observations: A concerning observation on the surveillance cameras memo

objects.name: Fingerprint Kit
objects.observations: A kit used for collecting fingerprints from surfaces

objects.name: Shredded Note (Half)
objects.text: Professor Bark did not act alone, the hooveprint should be enough indication to who his alias is. To get the name, find the name hidden in the image using AES. The key is my favorite meal.

objects.name: Captain Meow's Tablet
objects.observations: -Fav meal: Tuna Fish Sandwich With Chives And A Side Of CocaCola And A Cup Of Milk -Fav color: Black -Fav number: Eight -Fav country: Meowland -Fav activity: Napping

objects.name: Bluetooth Scanner
objects.observations: A device for detecting nearby Bluetooth signals.

objects.name: Dr Octopus data
objects.text: We have noticed a security breached.
objects.observations: Suspicious activity logged, passcode encrypted for safety purposes.

objects.name: CEO Computer
objects.observations: To find me, locate the public IP address to locate me.

objects.name: CEO Briefcase
objects.observations: An expensive leather briefcase with a sturdy lock.

contents.name: Incriminating Documents
contents.observations: A bunch of IP addresses, follow the public IP address to find me.

contents.name: Flag
contents.text:
I knew you could do it! You found me! Here is your prize for rescuing me: 
flag{sampleflaghere}

objects.name: Data safe
objects.observations: A locked closet containing an important key. It requires a PIN to open.

contents.name: Briefcase Key
contents.observations: A small key labeled 'Personal - Do Not Copy.'
